title: ‘Zappa’ Review: A Rock Star Savant
sub_head: A compelling documentary delivers a comprehensive portrait of provocative musical polymath Frank Zappa.
body: In the epic “Zappa,”Frank Zappa’s widow, Gail, sums up her musical polymath/provocateur husband as having been first and foremost a composer—“which means that absolutely everything is against you.” Still, there were some lucky breaks: As Zappa himself recalls, the famed record producer Tom Wilson, having been “dragged to the Whisky a Go Go” to hear Zappa’s audacious Mothers of Invention in 1966, was having such a good time he really listened to only one relatively conventional number. “He said, ‘Oh, a white blues band. OK,...
